title: Ticket #4691: DAGMan PRE/POST script reapers are stupidly inefficient
description: In ScriptQ (several places) we call Dag::PreScriptReaper() and Dag::PostScriptReaper(). The stupid thing is this -- we pass the node name to the Dag methods, and they immediately call FindNodeByName() to get the Job object -- but we have access to the Job object in ScriptQ and we could just pass a pointer to it instead of passing the node name...
